page.title: 15Noise Pollution:World's End
page.content: A motorway, the M4, runs through our area. A new dual carraigeway, the A34 or the Beedon bypass, has been built, this runs along the old main road. These two roads cause an awful lot of noise in the area as well as pollution. With the continuing upsurge of huge tractor machinery the noise level around certain farms has greatly increased in the last decade. Nearly every weekend of the shooting season a party goes out to shoot in the local woods. This can be considered a pleasant noise compared to that of the motorway and roads. Local teenagers use the woods for motorbike scrambling. This also causes an awful lot of noise and can be menacing on a quiet Sunday afternoon.
